Class ProviderService

java.lang.Object
com.prototype.services.ProviderService
public class ProviderService extends Object
Service class that manages business logic related to Provider entities.

This class performs validations and coordinates communication with the ProviderDAO to ensure safe and consistent data operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProviderService()
    Constructs a new ProviderService and initializes its DAO dependency.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProviderService

      public ProviderService()
      Constructs a new ProviderService and initializes its DAO dependency.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<Provider> findAll()
      Retrieves all registered providers.
      Returns:
      a list of all Provider entities.

    • createProvider

      public Provider createProvider(String name, String taxId, String contactEmail, String address)
      Creates and saves a new Provider.

      Validates all required fields before persisting the new entity.

      Parameters:
      name - the provider's name; must not be blank.
      taxId - the tax identification number; must not be blank.
      contactEmail - the provider's email; must be valid.
      address - the provider's physical address; must not be blank.
      Returns:
      the newly created Provider.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter does not pass validation.

    • findById

      public Provider findById(Long id)
      Finds a Provider by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the provider's ID; must not be null.
      Returns:
      the found Provider.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null.
      javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the provider does not exist.

    • updateProvider

      public Provider updateProvider(Long id, String newName, String newTaxId, String newEmail, String newAddress)
      Updates an existing Provider's information.
      Parameters:
      id - the provider's ID; must not be null.
      newName - new provider name; must not be blank.
      newTaxId - new tax ID; must not be blank.
      newEmail - new email; must be valid.
      newAddress - new address; must not be blank.
      Returns:
      the updated Provider.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validations fail.
      javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the provider does not exist.

    • removeProvider

      public Provider removeProvider(Long id)
      Removes a Provider by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the provider to remove; must not be null.
      Returns:
      the removed Provider instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null.
      javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no provider exists with the given ID.
